Structs/TemplateRaw.html.abstract: A chunk of Data to be rendered. This is used to represent the large

Protocols/TagRenderer.html.abstract: Capable of rendering instances of TemplateTag in the AST. Each invocation of a tag in a template

Enums/TemplateExpression/PrefixOperator..name: not
Enums/TemplateExpression/PrefixOperator..abstract: Checks whether the value is not truthy.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: subtract
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Subtracts the right value from the left value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: divide
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Divides the left value by the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: modulo
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: The remainder from dividing the left value by the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: lessThan
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left value is less than the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: greaterThan
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left value is greater than the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: lessThanOrEqual
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left value is less than or equal to the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: greaterThanOrEqual
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left value is greater than or equal to the right value.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: equal
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left and right values are equal.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: notEqual
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left and right values are not equal.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: and
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left and right values are truthy.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: or
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Checks whether the left or right value is truthy.

Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.name: order
Enums/TemplateExpression/InfixOperator.h.abstract: Operator precedence order (used internally by LeafParser when extracting parameters).

Enums/TemplateConstant.html.abstract: Supported constant values. These can be thought of as TemplateIdentifier that do

Enums/TemplateExpression.html.name: TemplateExpression
Enums/TemplateExpression.html.abstract: An infix, prefix, or postfix expression, e.g., 1 + 2, !1, and a || b.

Enums/TemplateSyntaxType.html.name: TemplateSyntaxType
Enums/TemplateSyntaxType.html.abstract: This enum represents all supported AST types.

Global Variables.html#/s:11TemplateKit11.abstract: Contains all default tags with default names.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: name
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Name used for this tag as registered to the TemplateRenderer.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: source
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: TemplateSource code location of this parsed tag

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: container
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Current Container, use this as a Worker or to create services.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: error(reason:)
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Create a general TemplateTagError with metadata such as the TemplateSource.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: requireParameterCount(_:)
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Throws an error if the parameter count does not equal the supplied number n.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: requireBody()
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Throws an error if this tag does not include a body.

Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.name: requireNoBody()
Classes/TagContext.html#/s:11TemplateKit.abstract: Throws an error if this tag includes a body.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: file
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Path to file being parsed currently. If the bytes being parsed are not from a file on disk,

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: column
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Current column offset into the current line.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: peek(by:)
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Peeks ahead to byte in front of current byte by supplied amount.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: pop()
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Returns current byte and increments byte pointer.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: requirePop()
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Calls pop(), throwing an error if there are no more bytes.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: peekMatches(_:)
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Returns true if the upcoming bytes match the supplied array of bytes.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: makeSourceStart()
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Creates a new TemplateSourceStart at the current location.

Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.name: makeSource(using:)
Classes/TemplateByteScanner.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Closes a TemplateSourceStart at the current location, creating a TemplateSource.

Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.name: condition
Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.abstract: This TemplateSyntax will be evaluated for truthiness when determining whether

Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.name: body
Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.abstract: Collection of TemplateSyntax to evaluate if the condition is truthy.

Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.name: next
Classes/TemplateConditional.html#/s:11Te.abstract: If condition is not truthy and this property is not nil, it will be evaluated.

Classes/TemplateConditional.html.name: TemplateConditional
Classes/TemplateConditional.html.abstract: A conditional collection of syntax to execute if the specified condition is truthy.

Classes/Comment.html.name: Comment
Classes/Comment.html.abstract: Ignores zero or more parameters always returning an empty String.

Classes/Contains.html.name: Contains
Classes/Contains.html.abstract: Returns true if the supplied array contains a given item.

Classes/Count.html.name: Count
Classes/Count.html.abstract: Returns the number of items in the supplied array.

Classes/DateFormat.html.name: DateFormat
Classes/DateFormat.html.abstract: Formats a floating-point time interval since epoch date to a specified format.

Classes/Raw.html.name: Raw
Classes/Raw.html.abstract: Prints a parameter without HTML-escaping it (be careful!).

Classes/TagContext.html.name: TagContext
Classes/TagContext.html.abstract: Contains contextual information corresponding to a TemplateTag in the AST.
